testmod-ObsoleteBoomerang.NAME: Obsolete Boomerang
testmod-ObsoleteBoomerang.FLAVOR: 你越是使用这个回旋镖，你越会沉迷于其中。
DESCRIPTIONS: Whenever playing a card, deal a damage of the amount of cards played this turn to random enemy.

testmod-NoteOfAlchemist.NAME: Note Of Alchemist (This relic is deprecated)
DESCRIPTIONS: 拾起时失去现有的除了该遗物的所有遗物。失去的遗物按照该规则获得新遗物:普通->罕见；罕见->稀有； 稀有->增加 #b5 点最大生命；Boss->普通； 商店->Boss；初始->商店。(超过25件遗物很可能会出bug)

testmod-ThreeSidedDice.NAME: D-3 (This relic is deprecated)
testmod-ThreeSidedDice.FLAVOR: 你无法理解这个物体，但觉得只要携带它，就能给你带来幸运。
DESCRIPTIONS: 每当一张牌被打出时，有 #b1/3 的概率将其消耗，有 #b1/3 的概率回复其消费的能量，有 #b1/3 的概率额外打出一次。

testmod-BlackFramedGlasses.NAME: Black Framed Glasses
testmod-BlackFramedGlasses.FLAVOR: 这个眼镜让你感觉还能再撑一秒。
DESCRIPTIONS: At the start of each turn, heal #b1 HP, every enemies lose #b1 HP. Whenever yoou would receive a unblocked damage not less than half of your Max HP, reduce it to #b1; if it comes from yourself, reduce it to #b0.

testmod-BouquetWithThorns.NAME: Bouquet With Thorns
testmod-BouquetWithThorns.FLAVOR: 捧着这束花，你仿佛不再需要击退你的敌人。
DESCRIPTIONS: At the start of each combat, gain #b1 Throns. Whenever being attacked, gain #b1 Throns; whenever you receive unblocked attack damage, gain #b1 extra Throns. Whenever damaged by losing HP, gain #b1 Throns for each HP lost in this damage.

testmod-PortableAltar.NAME: Portable Altar
testmod-PortableAltar.FLAVOR: 这个祭坛给予了你强大的能力，但也贪婪地吞噬着你的生命。
DESCRIPTIONS: At the start of each turn, lose #r1 HP. Whenever you climb a floor, lose #r1 Max HP. For every #b5 Max HP lost through this relic: At the start of each combat, gain #b1 #yStrength,  #yDexterity and #yPlated Armor; you will not lose HP from this relic in the first #b1 turn of each combat.

testmod-EnergyCheck.NAME: Energy Check
DESCRIPTIONS: If you have insufficient energy to play a card, you may advance energy next turn. If the amount of energy your advanced surpass your default energy each turn, for each energy surpassed, lose #r1 HP; for each more energy surpassed, lose #r1 more HP.

testmod-SevenDeadlySins.NAME: Seven Deadly Sins
DESCRIPTIONS: Upon pickup, if not having, obtain #yDu-Vu #yDoll, #yDarkstone #yPeriapt, #yBlue #yCandle, #rCurses #rof #rSins. Whenever defeating Boss with each kind of #rSins, you may choose to obtain an extra Boss relic.

testmod-Register.NAME: Register
testmod-Register.FLAVOR: 关机前自动保存，启动时自动读取。
DESCRIPTIONS: All the powers that were greater than #b1 at the end of a combat will be saved, you will gain #b1 of each of these powers at the start of next combat. ( #ySL will cause losing saved powers)

testmod-InfectionSource.NAME: Infection Source
testmod-InfectionSource.FLAVOR: 你感到自己变得虚弱了，但同时变得能操纵病毒。
DESCRIPTIONS: Your attack damage is decreased by #r50%. All enemies that attacked by you will gain same amount of #yPoison as the damage amount they should receive, however they will only lose #b1 HP from your attack.

testmod-OneHitWonder.NAME: One Hit Wonder
DESCRIPTIONS: Whenever your HP is #b1: your attack has half chance cause non-Boss target to die; Boss enemies' damage is decreased by #b50%, Boss enemies receive #b50% more attack damage and unblocked non-attack damage.

testmod-Recursion.NAME: Recursion
testmod-Recursion.FLAVOR: “人理解迭代，神理解递归 。” —— 彼得杜奇
DESCRIPTIONS: Draw #b5 additional cards on the first turn of each combat. For rest of turns, draw #b1 fewer card than the previous turn. Reset the progress every #b10 turns.

testmod-Temperance.NAME: Temperance
testmod-Temperance.FLAVOR: “节制是最好的医术。” —— 博恩
DESCRIPTIONS: Whenever you add #b3 cards to your deck, you may remove #b1 card from your deck.

testmod-Justice.NAME: Justice
DESCRIPTIONS: Whenever gain a negative effect, gain #b1 #yStrength.

testmod-Fortitude.NAME: Fortitude
testmod-Fortitude.FLAVOR: “勇敢不在于能够蔑视危险，而在于认请危险、战胜危险。” —— 布勒森东
DESCRIPTIONS: If you end your turn without #yBlock, gain #b3 #yStrength.

testmod-Charity.NAME: Charity
testmod-Charity.FLAVOR: “慈善的行为比金钱更能解除别人的痛苦。” —— 卢梭
DESCRIPTIONS: Whenever you gain #ygold, gain #b1 less, increase your Max HP by #b1 instead.

testmod-Hope.NAME: Hope
testmod-Hope.FLAVOR: “希望是坚韧的拐杖，忍耐是旅行袋，携带它们，人可以登上永恒之旅。” —— 罗素
DESCRIPTIONS: Whenever you receive unblocked #yattack damage, you have a probablity of #b

% to be fully healed and make all enemies die. Whenever you don't have any cards in your hand, you have a probablity of #b6.18% to choose copies of a maximum of #b10 cards in your deck to put into your hand. Whenever receive #yattack damage without active, the probablity will be increased by a flat #b0.618% till it actives.

Whenever you receive unblocked #yattack damage, you have a probablity of #b0.618% to be fully healed and make all enemies die. Whenever you don't have any cards in your hand, you have a probablity of #b6.18% to choose copies of a maximum of #b10 cards in your deck to put into your hand. Whenever receive #yattack damage without active, the probablity will be increased by a flat #b0.618% till it actives.

testmod-Prudence.NAME: Prudence
testmod-Prudence.FLAVOR: 有bug也不是什么重要的问题吧。
DESCRIPTIONS: In your turns, you can play all the cards that wouldn't be allowed to play if having sufficient energy. If it is #yStatus or #yCurse, #yExhaust it.

testmod-Faith.NAME: Faith
DESCRIPTIONS: Whenever you enter a shop, gain a huge amount of #ygold which will be removed when leaving this shop. After purchasing the first product in this shop, reset your #ygold back to what it was before gaining the huge amount of #ygold. When entering next shop, lose the amount of gold of this product's price, if your #ygold is insufficient, set your #ygold to #b0 and receive a damage of the maximum between #b25% of current HP and #b10% of the amount of overdraft, (at least #b1), the overdraft will remain for next shop.

testmod-AssaultLearning.NAME: Assault Learning
DESCRIPTIONS: At the start of each turn, #upgrade the first upgradable card from top of your drawpile for rest of combat.

testmod-Muramasa.NAME: Muramasa
testmod-Muramasa.FLAVOR: 这个人很懒，什么都没有写。
DESCRIPTIONS: Whenever the number of drawing and playing of #b0 cost attacks sum up to #b2, draw #b1 card.

testmod-D_4.NAME: Runic Tetrahedron
DESCRIPTIONS: Whenever you play a card, one of the following #b4 effects will become effective. NL #yExhaust this card, regain its energy cost, play it one more time, #yNightTerror the card. NL You can know which the effect will become effective for the next card.
Whenever you play a card, one of the #b4 effects will become effective. NL Next effect: NL

testmod-HeartOfDaVinci.NAME: Heart Of Da Vinci
testmod-HeartOfDaVinci.FLAVOR: 你现在感觉到你仿佛能接受所有恩惠。
DESCRIPTIONS: Other character's relics are now obtainable. NL Whenever you pickup another character's relic, choose and add #b1 of #b20 of that character's cards to your deck.

testmod-IncinerationGenerator.NAME: Incineration Generator
testmod-IncinerationGenerator.FLAVOR: 这个人很懒，什么都没有写。
DESCRIPTIONS: At the start of each turn: gain
, #yExhaust a card.

testmod-IndustrialRevolution.NAME: Industrial Revolution
testmod-IndustrialRevolution.FLAVOR: 这个人很懒，什么都没有写。
DESCRIPTIONS: Enemies that had #yArtifact, will not be able to give positive effects to themselves, nor negative effects to player.

testmod-AscensionHeart.NAME: Ascension Heart
testmod-AscensionHeart.FLAVOR: 这个人很懒，什么都没有写。

testmod-RealStoneCalender.NAME: The Real Stone Calender
DESCRIPTIONS: At the end of each turn, deal the number of turn squared damage to ALL enemies. Reset turn counter for damage every #b7 turns.

testmod-Nyarlathotep.NAME: Nyarlathotep
testmod-Nyarlathotep.FLAVOR: 玩牌类游戏的时候可以无限制的变出Joker，因此立于不败之地。
DESCRIPTIONS: All the cards you played, will also be treated as being #yExhausted, being #yDiscarded and a #yPower. Whenever a card is #yExhausted or #yDiscarded, it will also be treated as the other one.

testmod-BalancedPeriapt.NAME: Balanced Periapt
testmod-BalancedPeriapt.FLAVOR: 这个人很懒，什么都没有写。
DESCRIPTIONS: Your Max HP will never change anymore. Whenever you would change your Max HP, change your HP instead by a factor of #b3 if increase, #b1 if decrease.

testmod-MagicalMallet.NAME: Magical Mallet
testmod-MagicalMallet.FLAVOR: 上面的文字被人抹去了
DESCRIPTIONS: At the start of each turn, record the maximum and minimum cost of your hand, make all cards with these two costs in your hand switch to the other cost for rest of combat.

testmod-Laevatain.NAME: Laevatain
DESCRIPTIONS: Upon pickup, obtain #b3 random #yCurse. At the start of each combat, gain #b3 #yStrength. Every #b3 turns, for each #yCurse in your deck, gain #b1 #yStrength.

testmod-TimeTraveler.NAME: The Time Traveler
DESCRIPTIONS: At the start of each turn, gain

. You have #b100 (Max) #ySAN by default. Whenever #ySL will decrease your #ySAN by #r50%, at the end of combat, gain #b5 #ySAN, gain #b10 #ySAN when you Rest. Whenever you end combat with less than #b20 #ySAN, lose #r10 Max HP. Whenever you start a turn with less than #b10 #ySAN, lose #r1 HP.

testmod-Maize.NAME: The Maize
testmod-Maize.FLAVOR: 这个人很懒，什么都没有写。
DESCRIPTIONS: When you play #b5 #ySkill during your turn, gain #b1 #yIntangible.

testmod-DragonStarHat.NAME: The Dragon Star Hat
DESCRIPTIONS: 每当你在休息处休息后，充能值上限增加 #b1 。每当你经过休息处，将充能值恢复至最大。每次休息处后的战斗开始时获得充能值点 #y力量 并减少 #b1 充能。
NL 当前上限为 #b
，下一场战斗开始获得 #b
点 #y力量 。

testmod-SaigiyounoYou.NAME: Saigiyou no You
testmod-SaigiyounoYou.FLAVOR: 邪恶又优雅的不祥之物
DESCRIPTIONS: 每当你对敌方造成伤害时，回复 #b1 点生命。

testmod-Nine.NAME: ⑨
DESCRIPTIONS: 每次受到致命伤害时无条件将生命上限数值降低 #b9 点，同时将此次伤害降为 #b1 。该遗物造成的生命上限降低不会被影响。

testmod-Motorcycle.NAME: The Motorcycle
DESCRIPTIONS: 非Boss战斗中第一回合可以右击该遗物逃跑。 NL ( #ySL 后本场战斗失效)

testmod-DreamHouse.NAME: Dream House
DESCRIPTIONS: 拾取时获得 #y开心小花 和 #y灯笼 。每回合开始获得
。你只能获得普通卡。

testmod-CrystalShield.NAME: Crystal Shield
testmod-CrystalShield.FLAVOR: 你构筑的防御，透过这个护盾后，看起来仿佛被模糊了。
DESCRIPTIONS: 如果你在你的回合获得过 #y格挡 ，该回合结束时获得 #b1 层 #y残影 。

testmod-BottledCurse.NAME: Bottled Curse (This relic is deprecated)
testmod-BottledCurse.FLAVOR: 这个人很懒，什么都没有写。
DESCRIPTIONS: 拾起时，选择一张 #y诅咒牌 。在每场战斗开始时，这张牌会出现在手牌中。如果成功选择，每回合开始获得 [R] 。
选择一张牌
在每场战斗开始时，将 #y
放入你的手牌。每回合开始获得 [R] 。

testmod-Alchemist.NAME: The Alchemist
testmod-Alchemist.FLAVOR: 无法无中生有，却可以复制一个已有的样本。
DESCRIPTIONS: 拾起时，获得 #b1 个药水栏位。每场战斗中有 #b1 次机会可以在你的回合右击该遗物来自动使用第一瓶可使用的药水，但这瓶药水不会消耗。

testmod-StringDisintegrator.NAME: String Disintegrator
testmod-StringDisintegrator.FLAVOR: 这台机器上没有任何文字，但你不知为何能理解它的用途。
DESCRIPTIONS: 每回合开始获得
。你在战斗中无法再看见所有牌的文字。

testmod-HarvestTotem.NAME: The Harvest Totem
testmod-HarvestTotem.FLAVOR: 尖塔住民祈求丰收的象征，仿佛能给尖塔带来生命力。
DESCRIPTIONS: 拾起时，将你的最大生命翻倍。你增加的最大生命和受到的治疗效果翻倍。普通敌人将会拥有 #b1.1 倍最大生命，精英敌人将会拥有 #b1.2 倍最大生命， #yBoss 敌人将会拥有 #b1.5 倍最大生命。

testmod-BatchProcessingSystem.NAME: Batch Processing System
DESCRIPTIONS: 每回合开始减少
。 NL 每当你在同一回合内连续打出的两张牌耗能相同时，获得

testmod-CardMagician.NAME: The Card Magician
DESCRIPTIONS: 在每回合开始获得
，并将你的弃牌堆洗入抽牌堆。

testmod-NegativeEmotionEnhancer.NAME: The Negative Emotion Enhancer
DESCRIPTIONS: 在每回合开始获得
，轮流获得 #y脆弱 、 #y虚弱 、 #y易伤 。击败敌人时，恢复 #b1 点生命。战斗胜利时增加 #b1 点最大生命。

testmod-LackOfCard.NAME: Lack Of Card (This relic is deprecated)
DESCRIPTIONS: 回合开始时，如果手牌数不超过当前能量，额外抽 #b2 张牌，否则下一回合开始获得

testmod-Brilliant.NAME: Brilliant
DESCRIPTIONS: 每场战斗开始时和每当敌人死亡时，对所有敌人造成当前 #y金币 数量的平方的三次根的一半的伤害。

testmod-BirthdayGift.NAME: The Birthday Gift (This relic is deprecated)
DESCRIPTIONS: 拾起时，将 #y金币 清零，并获得所有未拥有的非Boss加费遗物。

testmod-IWantAll.NAME: I Want All
testmod-IWantAll.FLAVOR: 小孩子才做选择；而我，全都要！
DESCRIPTIONS: 有 #b10 次机会，可以在战斗奖励界面右键点击此遗物，添加一份完全相同的该次战斗的卡牌奖励，每场战斗只能使用一次。
这件遗物的效果已经用尽。

testmod-Antiphasic.NAME: Antiphasic
DESCRIPTIONS: 每当受到单次伤害数值不低于 #b25% 最大生命时，先增加 #b5 点生命上限再进行伤害结算。最大生命和受到伤害均为 #b1 时此遗物不生效。

testmod-IntensifyImprint.NAME: Intensify Imprint
testmod-IntensifyImprint.FLAVOR: 你还能坚持到什么时候呢？
DESCRIPTIONS: 你每对敌人造成一次伤害，你在下一回合开始前对敌人造成伤害的最终数值都会增加 #b1 。
你在下一回合开始前对敌人造成的下一次伤害的最终数值增加 #b

testmod-KeyOfTheVoid.NAME: The Key Of The Void
testmod-KeyOfTheVoid.FLAVOR: 虚空是这个世界的终极答案。
DESCRIPTIONS: 每场战斗结束时，你每有 #b1 件 #yBoss 遗物，从牌组中选择 #b1 张牌将其移除。
选择
张牌移除。

testmod-ThousandKnives.NAME: Thousand Knives
DESCRIPTIONS: 每当你抽到或打出 #b0 耗能的攻击牌时，分别将一张其复制品放入手牌或弃牌堆。打出时，手牌中每有一张 #b0 耗能的攻击牌，获得 #b1 格挡。

testmod-FatalChain.NAME: Fatal Chain
DESCRIPTIONS: 每当你杀死敌人时，对所有敌人造成击杀溢出伤害的 #b2.718 倍的伤害。

testmod-CyclicPeriapt.NAME: Cyclic Periapt
DESCRIPTIONS: 你的每张 #y消耗 牌在每场战斗中第一次被打出时不会被 #y消耗 。

testmod-HistoricalDocuments.NAME: Historical Documents (This relic is deprecated)
testmod-HistoricalDocuments.FLAVOR: 给的状态有什么问题都不是我的问题，请向尖塔反馈。
DESCRIPTIONS: 每回合开始获得一种随机的被尖塔废弃的正面或负面状态。

testmod-EqualTreatment.NAME: Equal Treatment
DESCRIPTIONS: 你在每回合打出的第一张指向单个敌人的牌，也会对其余所有敌人各生效一次。

testmod-ConstraintPeriapt.NAME: Constraint Periapt
DESCRIPTIONS: 战斗开始时，将 #b1 张 #y灼伤 洗入抽牌堆。回合结束时，不考虑能量因素，你手牌中每有一张不能被打出的牌，恢复 #b1 生命并对所有敌人造成 #b10 点伤害。

testmod-InjuryResistance.NAME: Injury Resistance
testmod-InjuryResistance.FLAVOR: 这个人很懒，什么都没有写。
DESCRIPTIONS: 每当受到伤害后，接下来受到的伤害的最终数值都将降低 #b1 。 NL 当通过此遗物完全格挡一次伤害后，数值重置。

testmod-Déjàvu.NAME: Déjàvu
DESCRIPTIONS: 如果你在回合内只出过一种类型的牌，且回合结束时没有能量剩余，下回合开始时将这些牌的复制品放入手牌，其耗能将在回合内变为 #b0 且打出时 #y消耗 。

testmod-DeterminationOfClimber.NAME: The Determination Of Climber
testmod-DeterminationOfClimber.FLAVOR: 然而某些登山者总是喜欢原地踏步。
DESCRIPTIONS: 在每场战斗内，每当你打出的牌的耗能比前一张牌高时，每高出 #b1 点，获得
，回复 #b1 生命，抽 #b1 张牌，对所有敌人造成 #b1 伤害，获得 #b1 金币。

testmod-BloodSacrificeSpiritualization.NAME: Blood Sacrifice Spiritualization
DESCRIPTIONS: 战斗开始时，可以选择失去 #b10% 最大生命(至少 #b1 )的生命，从你的所有牌中选择一张牌，将其对随机目标打出。若其可被 #y升级 则在打出前将其在本局游戏 #y升级 。

testmod-LifeArmor.NAME: Life Armor
testmod-LifeArmor.FLAVOR: 这个人很懒，什么都没有写。
DESCRIPTIONS: 在战斗中失去生命后，立即获得其数值的 #y格挡 ，每失去一次，下次额外获得 #b1 点。

testmod-CasingShield.NAME: Casing Shield
testmod-CasingShield.FLAVOR: 这个人很懒，什么都没有写。
DESCRIPTIONS: 每当你获得一次 #y格挡 ，本回合接下来获得的 #y格挡 数值都将增加 #b1 。

testmod-TestBox.NAME: Test Box
DESCRIPTIONS: 右键单击或右键双击本遗物，从遗物和卡牌中选择一类，再从随机的 #b3 件本 #bmod 内的该类物品中选择 #b1 件获得。使用后本遗物 #y失效 。 #r只能在0层使用 。

testmod-Acrobat.NAME: The Acrobat
testmod-Acrobat.FLAVOR: 这个人很懒，什么都没有写。
DESCRIPTIONS: 在回合内，每当连续打出的两张牌在手牌中的编号增减情况和上次不同时，获得 #b1 金币。

testmod-Mahjong.NAME: The Mahjong
testmod-Mahjong.FLAVOR: 这个人很懒，什么都没有写。
DESCRIPTIONS: 在战斗中进行麻将游戏，每回合开始摸一张麻将牌后选择切出一张，将其加入手牌。打出 #y宝牌 的效果翻倍。根据和牌点数获得其他效果。 NL #r这件遗物还未制作完成，只能发挥一小部分效果，并含有许多bug(初次战斗闪退，重开自动修复)若目前不想测试本遗物可选择重开。
